thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Avic Real Estate Lowers Forecast For 2017 Net Profit

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Avic Real Estate Lowers Forecast For 2017 Net Profit

organizations.name: avic real estate holding co ltd

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Avic Real Estate Holding Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT REVISES DOWN 2017 FORECAST TO NET PROFIT OF 135.0-161.4 MILLION YUAN VERSUS 161.4 MILLION YUAN ($25.47 million) YEAR AGO
* SAYS IT PREVIOUSLY EXPECTED 2017 NET PROFIT TO RISE TO 440-510 MILLION YUAN VERSUS 161.4 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2Hh09Jp Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3366 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
